caption: The image is a poster for Ramadhan Kareem, featuring a quote from Holy Prophet Muhammad. The quote states that whoever recites only one 'Ayat' in Holy Ramadhan will be awarded as if they had recited the full Qur'an in other months. The poster is decorated with stars and lights, adding a festive touch to the design.
texts:
“Whosoever recites only one ‘Ayat’ in 
Holy Ramadhan, he will be awarded as if 
he had recited the full Qur’an in other months.”
